Text: can you please upload this to fit on a dvd9 with 720p dts

"can you please upload this to fit on a dvd9 with 720p dts "

do it yourself. Why should they ?

Thanks for the up, much appreciated

You should be able to take this as is and burn it to a DVD9 (or a DVD5, for that matter) with ConvertXtoDVD, which is available here on the PB. It's a great piece of software. Be sure to turn off automatic updates.
